name: Undead Uprising
location: The settlement with the most cemeteries or (if no settlements have cemeteries) the largest settlement
description: A malign force, be it a sinister curse, a nefarious necromancer, or an invasion of ghouls, vampires, or other undead-creating monsters, causes the dead to rise from their graves and threaten the settlement.

success.msg: The undead are temporarily contained with little physical damage to your settlement, but the populace still grow fearful each night. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: The undead prey upon your citizens! and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1

criticalFailure.msg:
The undead gain the advantage and bring disaster. , increase all Ruins by 1
and one non-cemetery lot in your settlement (chosen by the players) is reduced to rubble.
